attributes.action: NOW IS THE TIME FOR UK TO GET OUT OF THE EU!
attributes.additional_details:
Recent events on the EU crisis would now seem to be singing the death-song of any further future for the UK in the EU. Now that we have just about alienated all of the EU, surely our future would be more prosperous if we were able to govern ourselves. Thus we can take control of our future and all that is ailing this once great nation.
NOW IS THE TIME FOR THIS GOVERNMENT TO  TAKE SWIFT ACTION AND GET US OUT OFTHE EU, BEFORE THE SITUATION GET'S ANY WORSE!
